name: group-4-staticsite
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.install-all: npm run install-api && npm run install-client
scripts.new-migration: cd api && prisma migrate dev --name init --schema src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db-migrate: cd api && npx prisma migrate deploy
